com.igeekinc.luwak.inode

Class InodeManager<I extends FUSEInode>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.igeekinc.luwak.inode.InodeManager<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - Inode class

    public class InodeManager<I extends FUSEInode>
extends java.lang.Object
    InodeManager provides a basic inode cache. Misses in the cache are satisfied by calling into the volume
    Author:
    David L. Smith-Uchida
